jobs.title: Flutter App for Ukrainian Veterans with Business Portal
jobs.description: Flutter app for Ukrainian veterans, with mobile (Android/iOS) and web platforms, user-friendly design, centralizing discounts. Includes business office for companies to manage offers, boosting community support and benefit access.

jobs.title: Liva Clinic Application Enhancement
jobs.description: Enhanced Flutter application and PostgreSQL/Sequelize backend, resolving bugs and adding features. Utilized AWS for backend stability, ensuring reliable system performance.

veteranam-info.title: Veteranam Info
veteranam-info.description: This app centralizes discounts and offers for war veterans in Ukraine, prioritizing ease of use and inclusivity for all tech skill levels. Built with Flutter, it includes mobile (Android/iOS) and web versions, designed for accessibility. A dedicated business portal allows companies to independently manage their discount offerings, streamlining the process for both veterans and service providers. The platform connects veterans with businesses, enhancing community support and improving access to benefits.

check-my-building.title: Check My Building
check-my-building.description: Check My Building is a mobile app developed with Flutter to streamline audits and improve house inspections. The app features photo-based confirmations, real-time updates, item-specific comments, and tools for planning audits, assigning responsibilities, and creating custom templates. By replacing email-based reports with this specialized solution, the business boosted efficiency, improved tracking, and reduced administrative workload, ultimately saving time and increasing operational clarity.

liva-clinic.title: Liva Clinic
liva-clinic.description: Liva Clinic is a comprehensive healthcare platform designed for both doctors and patients. It allows users to register in either role, book or offer appointments, and conduct consultations online or offline. Featuring integrated online payments, notification reminders, and real-time updates, the platform ensures seamless and accessible healthcare experiences across mobile and web. Built with Flutter for a consistent cross-platform interface and powered by a custom JavaScript backend on AWS, Liva Clinic streamlines the management of medical interactions for all users.

hunger-quest.title: Hunger Quest
hunger-quest.description: As a freelance developer for an agency, I utilized FlutterFlow to contribute to building and enhancing various features. My work included implementing functionality for adding and editing truck information, loading and displaying items from Firebase in a list view, integrating Google Maps for location selection, supporting two distinct user roles with separate access and behavior, and integrating Stripe for payment processing, including a user trial period.

ice-cream-time.title: Ice Cream Time
ice-cream-time.description: Ice Cream Time is a mobile app for ice cream trucks, developed with Flutter. The app allows users to view trucks on a real-time map, supports multiple user roles, and uses background location to automatically send vendor coordinates to the database and push notifications to users when a truck is nearby.

title.default: Demian Ilnytskyi - Associate Flutter Developer Portfolio

Main.description: Demian Ilnytskyi is an Associate Flutter Developer specializing in crafting intuitive, high-performance cross-platform mobile and web applications. With expertise in Flutter, Next.js, Firebase, PostgreSQL, and a range of back-end technologies, he delivers comprehensive and seamless user experiences, backed by experience in bug fixing, optimization, and code reviews.
